name: Chili
description: Owwww I think I burnth my thoung.
ingredients: 1 Â½ cups water, or as needed (Optional)
1 teaspoon chili powder, or more to taste

recipe.name: Cook Meat
recipe.description: Place ground beef and onion in a large saucepan over medium heat; cook and stir until meat is browned and onion is tender, about 5 to 7 minutes

recipe.name: Simmer Everything Together
recipe.description: Stir in tomato sauce, kidney beans, and stewed tomatoes with juice. If you prefer a thinner consistency, you can add water. Season with chili powder, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover and let simmer for 15 minutes.
